title: Google | L3 | Bengaluru
content:
**Education:** Tier - 3 college (2022 passout),
**Current Company:** Mid range product based company.
**Previous Salary:** 13.2 LPA (Fixed)
**Experience:** 1 year 10 months

**Company:** Google
**Title/Level:** L3
**Base Salary:** ₹23,50,000
**Bonus:** 15% of base
**Stock:** $49k stock grant vested over 4 years(38% first year)
**Signing Bonus:** ₹3,00,000
**Relocation:** Need to receive details from the Relocation team.
**Company Contribution to PF:** ₹1,12,000
**Benefits:** Standard Google benefits like Free Food, Free Cab, Gym etc.

**Other Companies Compensation Details:** https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5058364/goldman-sachs-oracle-citrix-urgent-suggestion-needed/

Finally proceeding ahead with Google :)
